articles.title: Scientists develop online calculator to predict individual’s risk of dying from Covid-19 - The Independent
articles.description: The online tool predicts a one-year mortality rate based on factors such as age, sex and underlying illnesses.
articles.content:
British scientists have built a calculator that can predict a persons risk of dying from coronavirus.
The online tool, created by researchers at University College London (UCL), predicts a one-year mortality rate based on factors such as age, sex and underly… [+2406 chars]
